body: could've sworn I rated this one before. Blonde guy might be an ass for abusing women like that, but I mean full on mind break / rape and all so. 1/10 consent.

Blonde guy at first was a good person, acting as an example of a perfect employee, even confronting his own boss to not engage in sexual harassment, but up until to the point of revealing him blackmailing another co-worker to have sex with him was when he deserved the shit that's going to go down. Nextly, admitting to why you're marrying your fiancee for only wealth and fame shows how much of a dipshit he was. Also, giving advice on someone who didn't ask at all is extremely rude as if you're implying their inadequate in their job. Furthermore, glasses guy is incompetent in his work, a complete pushover and doesn't know how to handle criticism which he replied back aggressively by drugging the blonde guy which ultimately changed his entire life, glasses guy has never shown anything of his life so I can't say anything of it. Lastly, Boss of the CEO was the cliche lecherous man in any hentai and included a gangbang scene, Oh and also he was a ugly bastard. 5/7.
I hope it gets decensored cause it looks interesting.

And this is how you tell about gender politics.. you show don’t tell then the problem with let a man in a woman shoes and show the important of not being a asshole

Did not like the glasses dude at first for being jealous of the blonde guy
Kinda liked blonde guy working hard and telling off boss
Blonde guy acting like a jerk telling off glasses guy and wanting glasses guy to quit his job, started to hate the blonde guy
Glasses guy finds out blonde guy is a hypocrite, a liar and asshole.
Glasses guy gives blonde guy a taste of his own medicine.
Starts to like glasses guy. 

What a roller coaster ride
